job_details.Functieomschrijving: Team  ServiceNow Research does both fundamental and applied research to futureproof AI-powered experiences. We are a group of researchers, applied scientists, and developers who lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies that unlock new work experiences in the future. Our Large Language Model (LLM) lab aims to advance the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models. The lab takes the lead in open-science and open-governance initiatives, such as BigCode, in which it develops large language models from scratch, conducts cutting-edge research on them, and establishes responsible data governance practices.
job_details.full_text:
Staff Research Engineer

Team  ServiceNow Research does both fundamental and applied research to futureproof AI-powered experiences. We are a group of researchers, applied scientists, and developers who lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies that unlock new work experiences in the future. Our Large Language Model (LLM) lab aims to advance the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models. The lab takes the lead in open-science and open-governance initiatives, such as BigCode, in which it develops large language models from scratch, conducts cutting-edge research on them, and establishes responsible data governance practices.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on research, open science, and foundational AI model development rather than building and deploying specific AI-powered applications or systems. While it mentions LLMs and AI experiences, it lacks the core responsibilities and technologies typically associated with an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: develops large language models from scratch
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation and training of models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.
Research on models, especially LLMs, is a core aspect of the 'Modeling' task, focusing on advancing their capabilities.
This indicates an understanding of how AI technologies align with future business needs and user experiences.

job_tasks.phrase: unlock new work experiences in the future
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the translation of technical capabilities into future business value and user experiences.

job_tasks.phrase: developers who lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies
job_tasks.justification: While focused on research, the involvement of 'developers' in laying foundations and experimenting with technologies implies some level of software development, though not necessarily application-focused.
Data governance is a component of responsible AI development and deployment, which can overlap with MLOps principles, particularly in ensuring data quality and compliance.

soft_skills.skill: responsible development of general-purpose AI models
